attributes.action: Daylight Saving Times should be abolished this year.
attributes.additional_details: I would like parliament to either get rid of daylight saving time or at least not implement it this year.
attributes.background: Daylight savings time should not be implemented this year. This will allow households to save on energy as it will be lighter in the evening.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you want to retain British Summer Time all year permanently or just for this year. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. It might be helpful to know that Daylight Savings Time is commonly used to describe British Summer Time rather than the period when the clocks are set to GMT.
